name: Princess-request
tagline: A C# and XNA Platformer game built in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare competition
body:
![Meet the Princess.](http://i.gjcdn.net/imgserver/game-header/950/33066_urbre68s.jpg)

### Download the game at [Game Jolt](http://gamejolt.com/games/platformer/a-princess-request/33066/)!
### About A Princess' Request
A young, mute knight hears a cry for help from a princess in danger while exploring some suspicious ruins. Unable to ignore this, he embarks on a quest between worlds to fix her mysterious "Machine."
(Note that the description may or may not embellish gameplay)

### About Ludum Dare
Ludum Dare is an online community best known for “Ludum Dare”, the Accelerated Game Development Event of the same name (also called a “Game Jam”). During a Ludum Dare, developers from around the world spend a weekend creating games based on a theme suggested by the community. Ludum Dare events take place every April, August and December.
Find out more at <http://ludumdare.com/compo/>

### Screenshots
![The beginning of a journey of epic proportions!](http://i.gjcdn.net/imgserver/screenshot-thumbnail/898x1000/64614.jpg)
![Set out on a quest to save the doomed princess](http://i.gjcdn.net/imgserver/screenshot-thumbnail/898x1000/64613.jpg)
![Explore a (small) number of desolate environments](http://i.gjcdn.net/imgserver/screenshot-thumbnail/898x1000/64612.jpg)
![Unfortunately, almost all of the worlds you visit are filled with death traps](http://i.gjcdn.net/imgserver/screenshot-thumbnail/898x1000/64611.jpg)
![Best not to ask what happened to the people that used to live here](http://i.gjcdn.net/imgserver/screenshot-thumbnail/898x1000/64610.jpg)
